scripts.build: echo "building cjs..." && rm -rf dist && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.cjs.build.json && echo "building esm..." && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.esm.build.json
scripts.build:core: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.cjs.build.core.json && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.esm.build.core.json
scripts.types:cjs:trace: rm -rf dist && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.cjs.build.json --generateTrace ./typetrace --diagnostics && yarn analyze-trace ./typetrace --skipMillis 100 --forceMillis 300
scripts.types:esm:trace: rm -rf dist && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.esm.build.json --generateTrace ./typetrace --diagnostics && yarn analyze-trace ./typetrace --skipMillis 100 --forceMillis 300
scripts.types:cjs:trace-test-app: rm -rf dist && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.cjs.trace.json --generateTrace ./typetrace --diagnostics && yarn analyze-trace ./typetrace --skipMillis 100 --forceMillis 300
scripts.types:esm:trace-test-app: rm -rf dist && npx tsc -p ./tsconfig.esm.trace.json --generateTrace ./typetrace --diagnostics && yarn analyze-trace ./typetrace --skipMillis 100 --forceMillis 300
scripts.lint: yarn run eslint --no-warn-ignored "src/**/*.ts" "spec/**/*.ts" "test-app/**/*.ts" && yarn run prettier . --check
